name: Slop Slinger
description:
Get back at those snooty kids from the rich school across the street by invading their cafeteria and starting a massive food fight. Everyone knows there's nothing snooty kids hate more than getting dirty.

Controls:

Keyboard

- Space to jump

- WASD to move

- Mouse to aim

- L. Click to shoot

- Ctrl to crouch

- Shift to sprint

- E to eat

- Q to slow down time

Controller

- A to jump

- Left Stick move

- Right Stick aim

- Right Trigger to shoot

- B to crouch

- L3 to sprint

- X to eat

- Right Bumper to slow down time
